body.name: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide, Fragrance-Free, 1.7 oz, Includes Olay Whip Travel Size for Dry Skin
features: SUPER CHARGED FACE CREAM Daily fragrance-free face moisturizer cream deeply hydrates to visibly firm skin for a lifted look
MAXIMIZED MOISTURE Hydrating formula that strengthens skin's moisture barrier for younger-looking skin
POWERFUL INGREDIENTS Formulated with Niacinamide/Vitamin B3 + Hyaluronic Acid, to help skin turnover, remove dead skin cells and correct the look of wrinkles
LAST BUT NOT LEAST Use as the final step of your skin care routine, morning and night
FREE OF parabens, phthalates or synthetic dyes
BENEFITS INCREASE OVER TIME from skin's texture looking smooth to looking and feeling visibly firmer with less wrinkles
body.description: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Face Moisturizer Cream is designed to start visibly reducing wrinkles & fine lines on day 1. Infused with Niacinamide, Amino-Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid and Antioxidants, this moisturizer instantly hydrates to visibly firm skin. This Regenerist formula is designed to deliver anti-aging ingredients deep into the skin's surface. Used as the last step in your skin care routine, this face cream leaves skin hydrated and softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Specifically formulated with firming and hydrating ingredients,• Niacinamide (Vitamin B3+) helps skin retain moisture, aids in surface skin cell turnover and regeneration, and exfoliates to remove dull skin• Amino Peptides are the building blocks of skin cells, known to help skin look smoother and firmer• Hyaluronic Acid is known to regulate water within skin's surface cells and to keep it hydrated throughout the dayHow to Use:•Cleanse your skin with Olay Total Effects 7-in-1 Facial Cleanser to dissolve dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying your skin•Treat your complexion concerns with Olay’s skin care products like brightening face serums and smoothing eye creams.•Moisturize by smoothing on your OLAY Micro-Scultpting face moisturizer creamOur moisturizer formula is:•mineral oil-free •phthalate-free •dye-free •no fragrance added.Also included is a 1 week sample of our Regenerist Whip Facial Moisturizer. This fragrance-free whipped moisturizer absorbs instantly leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth, never greasy.At OLAY, we're serious about our commitments. Our OLAY Skin Promise to you is zero skin retouching in all advertising. OLAY is the first mass skin care brand in the US to take this stance, because we know real beauty is honestly beautiful. We also guarantee you'll love your OLAY product. If you are not satisfied, we'll give you your money back via a prepaid card. Must submit within 60 days of purchase. Call toll-free 1-855-845-9797 or visit Visit Olay website/guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Regenerist is Olay’s Advanced Anti-Aging Collection. The supercharged Regenerist formulas, with key anti-aging ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin. Advanced Anti-Aging Formula Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream hydrates to improve elasticity and firm skin for a lifted look. Supercharged with skin-plumping Amino-Peptide Complex II, this cream moisturizer smoothes and corrects the look of fine lines and wrinkles. After just 4 weeks, it reduces the look of up to 10 years of wrinkles.

Science, Ingredients, Results & Regimen Science Olay analyzed over 70,000 genomic samples for over 17 years and discovered that about 10% of women naturally look years younger. Inspired by this discovery, Olay re-engineered its products to help take years off your visual skin age, delivering visible, transformative results, so every woman can be ageless.* *P&G Technical Studies, 1999-2016. Ingredients Re-engineered with Amino-Peptide Complex II and combined with key anti-aging ingredients like carob extract, Micro-Sculpting Cream helps correct the look of aging skin and aids surface cell regeneration. With Olay Regenerist, everybody has the chance to look younger, not just the 10%. Results 93% of women agreed Micro-Sculpting Cream makes skin more firm after 2 weeks.* You’ll even notice visible results day 1. The anti-aging formula is designed to deliver moisturizing ingredients 10 layers deep into the skin’s surface to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles fast. Regimen Micro-Sculpting Cream moisturizer is the last step in your daily skincare regimen. Its luxurious formula immediately leaves skin hydrated and provides long-lasting moisturization. Use Olay Regenerist cleansers, concentrates and treatments before applying moisturizer. Can be used morning, before applying makeup, and at night.

Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream SPF 30 Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Serum Regenerist Night Recovery Cream Regenerist Miracle Boost Concentrate Type Of Moisturizer Rich Cream Lightweight SPF Lotion Lightweight Serum Night Cream Add To Moisturizer: Ultra-Lightweight Concentrate To Boost Your Moisturizer Advanced Anti-Aging Benefits Visibly plumps, firms & corrects the look of wrinkles Visibly plumps, firms & protects against UVA/UVB rays Visibly plumps, firms & corrects the look of wrinkles, with a lightweight feel Rejuvenates & recharges while you sleep Instantly smoothes skin’s texture PLUS delivers 60% more anti-aging ingredients when paired with Micro-Sculpting Cream Available In Scented; Fragrance-Free Scented Scented; Fragrance-Free Fragrance-Free Fragrance-Free

Find The Right Collection For Your Skin Luminous formulas, with advanced tone-correcting ingredients like niacinamide and glycerin, are designed to visibly brighten skin and even tone. Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help fight signs of aging for younger-looking skin. ProX formulas, with ingredients like pro-retinol and amino peptides, offer proven skincare solutions to target root causes of aging for healthy-looking skin. The Olay Eyes Collection is specifically formulated for the delicate eye area to fight virtually every eye concern: dark circles, puffy eyes, fine lines and under eye wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrating and refreshing
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years. It's the best not one that makes my skin feel hydrated and refreshed that doesn't make me break out. I use it every day and one jar lasts me at least one month. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works nicely and ok with my rosacea
reviews.reviewText: I've used this for a few years now. I can't always send a real lot at a time so I love that this comes in a convenient size at an affordable price like this. And Amazon never fails to offer great deals. As far as wrinkles...I don't believe there is truly any miracle product out there, But -i do notice this has helped smooth out my wrinkle lines. It also moisturizes nicely, I have rosacea and this does not cause flair ups in my sensitive skin. In fact some of my meds cause my face skin to become a little dry at times and this product really helps balance it out. The fragrance is definitely not to much at all. It is a very soft scent that I feel only keeps it from smelling stale. After having in for 10 minutes I don't even notice a scent any more and my skin feels silky and fresh. I love this product. For nighttime I wake up feeling fresh skin. And daytime I apply right after shower and wait about 20 min to put on makeup. My wrinkle lines have diminished appearance and my skin is vibrant -not greasy looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have used for years. I swear by it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mother. She's been using it for years and loves this product. And I will say she has amazing skin.

Gutes Produkt. Spendet Feuchtigkeit und mildert Falten

Ich bin absolut begeistert. Die Creme fühlt sich auf der Haut wunderbar an und zieht auch schnell ein ohne einen Fettfilm zu hinterlassen. Ich benutze die Creme als Nachtpflege und ich finde die Haut sieht am nächsten schön frisch aus.
